channel.title: Aalto Dictionary of Machine Learning - Updates
channel.description: Updates to the Aalto Dictionary of Machine Learning: new terms, revisions, and figures Current coverage: 503 terms (Machine Learning Concepts 283 路 Mathematical Tools 191 路 Reinforcement Learning 13 路 Machine Learning Regulation 10 路 Machine Learning Systems 6).

item.title: New term: Soft Label
item.description: We added the term Soft Label to the Aalto Dictionary of ML. It covers probabilistic labels, uncertainty, and knowledge distillation.
